divs: Sighting DetailsA 54 yr old friend of mine who dosen't drink or use drugs and lives about 5 miles from me keeps telling me about strange things he and his wife have seen in the sky over their residence.He says he's seen lights and triangle shaped objects hovering and then moving radically in many directions. Where can I contact someone to investigate this ? mikecad@peoplepc.com
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Merced

This sighting has never been favorited.
